item.title: Meta 的扎克伯格向 DeepSeek 发起挑战，其创新能力在竞争对手中遥遥领先
item.description: 欢迎阅读 Tech In Depth，这是我们改版后的每日时事通讯，由彭博社全球记者提供有关科技商业的报道和分析。今天，库尔特-瓦格纳（Kurt Wagner）撰文指出，一家中国初创公司以较低成本开发的人工智能模型的出现，可能会对 Meta Platforms Inc.【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our revamped daily newsletter with reporting and analysis about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Kurt Wagner writes that the emergence of an AI model developed at a lower cost by a Chinese startup might prove beneficial to Meta Platforms Inc.】

item.title: 丹麦将为海上风电提供补贴，以重振市场活力
item.description: 丹麦将为海上风电和绿色氢能项目提供国家补贴，因为在经历了一次失败的招标和关键基础设施的延误之后，丹麦正努力重振这个备受煎熬的市场。【原文：Denmark will offer state subsidies to offshore wind and green hydrogen projects as it seeks to revive a suffering market after a failed tender and delays to crucial infrastructure.】

item.title: 美国在全球经济排名中进一步拉开与中国的距离
item.description: 我是克里斯-安斯蒂（Chris Anstey），波士顿的一名经济学编辑，今天我们将关注最新的美国与中国国内生产总值（GDP）数据。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net，或通过 @economics 在 X 上与我们联系。如果您还没有注册，请点击这里。【原文：I’m Chris Anstey, an economics editor in Boston, and today we’re looking at the latest US vs. China GDP figures. Send us feedback and tips to ecodaily@bloomberg.net or get in touch on X via @economics. And if you aren’t yet signed up to receive this newsletter, you can do so here.】

item.title: 芯片市场持续低迷，意法半导体裁员最高达 6
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，意法半导体公司（STMicroelectronics NV）正在考虑通过提前退休和自然减员的方式裁员多达约 6%，因为这家法意芯片制造商正面临着工业和汽车行业需求的长期低迷。【原文：STMicroelectronics NV is considering reducing its workforce by as much as about 6% through early retirements and attrition, according to people familiar with the matter, as the Franco-Italian chipmaker confronts a prolonged demand slump in the industrial and auto sectors.】

item.title: 拉美航空第四季度利润飙升，创下年度最高纪录
item.description: 拉塔姆航空公司第四季度的净收入比去年同期增长了两倍多，将其 2024 年的净收入推向了年度最高纪录。【原文：Latam Airlines’s net income more than tripled in the fourth quarter from the year earlier, pushing it’s net income for 2024 to an annual record.】

item.title: Hotelbeds 所有者 HBX 7.5 亿欧元西班牙首次公开募股数小时内售罄
item.description: 西班牙公司 HBX Group International Plc 在开始认购后数小时内就收到了投资者对其首次公开发行的所有股票的足够需求，这表明投资者对欧洲今年迄今为止最大的一次上市的胃口。【原文：Spanish firm HBX Group International Plc received enough demand from investors for all the shares in its initial public offering within hours after subscriptions opened, indicating appetite for Europe’s biggest listing of the year so far.】

item.title: 摩根大通优先股销售引发疯狂抢购优惠券热潮
item.description: 摩根大通公司本周发行的大额优先股让销售人员进入了最佳状态。他们的理由很简单：票面利率大幅跳升，这使得初级证券成为信贷领域最热门的交易之一。【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co.’s big preferred shares issue this week put sales desks into top gear. Their pitch was simple: a significant coupon jump — something that’s made the junior securities one of the hottest trades in credit.】

item.title: 雪佛龙预计二叠纪盆地石油产量今年将增长 10
item.description: 雪佛龙公司（Chevron Corp. ）首席执行官迈克-沃思（Mike Wirth）表示，尽管减少了在美国二叠纪盆地的资本支出，该公司今年仍计划将该地区的石油产量提高 10%。【原文：Chevron Corp. plans to increase oil production by as much as 10% in the US Permian Basin this year despite reducing capital spending in the region, said Chief Executive Officer Mike Wirth.】

item.title: 法国执法者称 DeepSeek 震惊显示人工智能可能具有竞争力
item.description: 据欧洲两位顶级反垄断监督机构称，中国人工智能新贵 DeepSeek 可能会改变竞争监管机构处理人工智能技术的方式。【原文：DeepSeek, the Chinese artificial intelligence upstart that’s sent shock waves through the industry, could alter the calculus of how competition regulators approach AI technology, according to two of Europe’s top antitrust watchdogs.】

item.title: 雷恩称欧洲央行政策近期将停止限制性政策
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员奥利-雷恩（Olli Rehn）表示，欧洲中央银行的利率将很快停止抑制经济活动。【原文：European Central Bank interest rates will soon stop restraining economic activity, according to Governing Council member Olli Rehn.】

item.title: 普京允许高盛出售其在俄罗斯的业务
item.description: 普京总统允许高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：President Vladimir Putin is allowing Goldman Sachs Group Inc. to sell its business in Russia, making the US firm one of the few Western banks to fully exit the country.】

item.title: 投资者仍对美国科技股欲罢不能
item.description: 本周初，从纽约到东京的市场都受到了人工智能相关担忧的冲击，但交易所交易基金领域的 "逢低买入 "者们却保持了信心。【原文：Dip buyers in the world of exchange-traded funds are keeping the faith, brushing off AI-related fears that battered markets from New York to Tokyo at the start of the week.】

item.title: 鲍威尔领导的美联储采取防御措施，多元化努力遭到抨击
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）对多元化、公平和包容性计划的攻势正在使美国中央银行陷入尴尬的困境。而到目前为止，美联储及其主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔似乎正在与总统保持一致。【原文：Donald Trump’s offensive against diversity, equity and inclusion programs is putting the US central bank in an uncomfortable squeeze. And so far, the Federal Reserve and its chair, Jerome Powell, appear to be falling in line with the president.】

item.title: 乌克兰无人机袭击俄罗斯主要炼油厂
item.description: 乌克兰无人机袭击了伏尔加河地区的一家大型炼油厂，这是一周内对俄罗斯下游设施的第三次夜间袭击。【原文：Ukrainian drones targeted a major oil refinery in the Volga region, marking the third overnight attack on Russian downstream facilities in a week.】

item.title: 特朗普的乌克兰和平野心引发东欧廉价股票飙升
item.description: 随着唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）推动和平谈判，近三年的乌克兰战争可能得到解决，东欧股市受益于这种乐观情绪，成为本月全球表现最好的股市之一。【原文：Eastern Europe’s stock markets are among the world’s best performers this month, benefiting from optimism that the nearly three-year war in Ukraine could be resolved as Donald Trump pushes for peace talks.】

item.title: 挪威扣留涉嫌破坏拉脱维亚-瑞典电缆的船只
item.description: 挪威当局扣留了第二艘涉嫌破坏连接瑞典和拉脱维亚的海底数据电缆的船只。【原文：A second vessel suspected of damaging a subsea data cable connecting Sweden and Latvia has been detained, this time by authorities in Norway.】

item.title: 创造 "华丽七巧板 "的战略家警告美国科技将落后
item.description: 美国银行（Bank of America Corp）的迈克尔-哈特奈特（Michael Hartnett）警告说，美国大型科技股今年将成为 "华丽的7"，他建议投资者购买便宜的国际股票，而不是追逐价格高昂的美股。【原文：US big tech stocks are set to become the “Lagnificent 7” this year, Bank of America Corp.’s Michael Hartnett warned, suggesting investors should buy cheap international stocks instead of chasing pricey US shares.】

item.title: 菲律宾经济增长乏力，央行行长希望降息
item.description: 菲律宾央行行长伊莱-雷莫洛纳（Eli Remolona）在政府报告经济增长连续第二年未达目标的前一天表示，菲律宾央行正考虑在下个月的会议上进一步降低借贷成本。【原文：The Philippine central bank is considering to cut borrowing cost further at next month’s meeting, Governor Eli Remolona said a day after the government reported that economic growth missed the target for a second straight year.】

item.title: 英国-摩洛哥 2,500 英里输电线路寻求政治拥护者
item.description: 计划在英国和摩洛哥之间铺设世界上最长海底电力电缆的公司表示，该项目需要政治支持才能实现。【原文：The company planning the world’s longest subsea power cable between the UK and Morocco says the project needs political support to become a reality.】

item.title: 欧洲央行要求银行进一步证明交易仍在欧洲进行
item.description: 欧洲中央银行希望世界顶级证券公司提供更多证据，证明它们在集团内进行了与欧盟客户有关的交易，从而加强了一场始于英国脱欧的长达数年的运动。【原文：The European Central Bank wants more proof from the world’s top securities firms that they’re conducting trading related to European Union clients in the bloc, stepping up a years-long campaign that started with Brexit.】

item.title: 社交媒体上的喧闹扰乱了股价，卡里扬公司加强了投资者外联工作
item.description: 印度卡扬珠宝有限公司（Kalyan Jewellers India Ltd.）加大了投资者宣传力度，试图挽回社交媒体上有关该公司的 "谣言 "对股价造成的损失。【原文：India’s Kalyan Jewellers India Ltd. has stepped up its investor outreach as it seeks to undo the stock price damage caused by “rumors” about the company in social media.】

item.title: 瑞典计划关闭六家国有 AP 养老基金中的两家
item.description: 瑞典计划将国有养老基金（统称 AP-fonderna）的数量从六个削减到四个，以提高资金管理者的成本效益。【原文：Sweden plans to cut the number of state-owned pension funds, collectively known as AP-fonderna, to four from six in a push to make the money managers more cost effective.】

item.title: 英国债券市场为税收怪圈带来的零售投资热潮做好准备
item.description: 在一种英国债券被赎回后，投资者正准备迎接大量散户资金涌入金边债券市场。【原文：Investors are preparing for a flood of retail cash to hit the gilt market after the redemption of a UK bond that has become popular among wealthy Brits looking to lower their tax bill.】

item.title: 兰特和债券下跌，因为埃斯科姆公司（Eskom）停电的幽灵再次出现
item.description: 在国有电力公司警告可能在十个多月来首次实施停电之后，南非兰特和债券暴跌，这预示着正在努力摆脱多年停滞的经济可能受到冲击。【原文：South Africa’s rand and bonds plunged after the state-owned electricity company warned it may implement power cuts for the first time in more than 10 months, signaling a potential hit to an economy struggling to emerge from years of stagnation.】

item.title: 印度央行通过外汇掉期注入 51 亿美元以缓解现金紧张状况
item.description: 印度央行通过外汇掉期拍卖注资 51 亿美元，五年来首次使用这一工具来缓解困扰金融系统的严重现金短缺问题。【原文：India’s central bank injected $5.10 billion through a foreign-exchange swap auction, using the tool for the first time in five years to ease a severe cash crunch plaguing the financial system.】

item.title: 肯尼亚电力公司因先令走强而宣布中期股息
item.description: 肯尼亚国营电力公司将在当地货币走强、贷款偿还成本降低后，九年来首次派发中期股息。该公司股价最高上涨了 33%。【原文：Kenya’s state-run power utility will pay an interim dividend for the first time in nine years after the local currency strengthened, slashing its loan repayment costs. Shares jumped as much as 33%.】

item.title: 德国风力发电量下降，可再生能源发电企业面临盈利风险
item.description: 德国今冬的风力发电量已降至四年来的最低水平，预计周末将再次出现低风速，威胁到可再生能源发电企业的利润。【原文：German wind output has fallen to the lowest level in four years this winter, with another bout of low wind speeds that threaten profits at renewable power operations expected over the weekend.】

item.title: 关于 MicroStrategy 的无限赚钱机器的更多信息（播客）
item.description: 现在大家都知道，微策略公司（MicroStrategy）看起来很像一个巨大的比特币 ETF。其创始人迈克尔-赛勒（Michael Saylor）是加密货币的忠实支持者，他的公司一直在抢购价值数十亿美元的比特币。迄今为止，这一策略已被证明是成功的。事实上，微策略公司的市值已经超过了其整个比特币投资组合的价值。这是怎么做到的？它还能持续多久？在本期节目中，我们将与彭博社的马特-列维（Matt Levi）进行对话。【原文：Everyone knows by now that MicroStrategy looks a lot like a giant Bitcoin ETF. Its founder, Michael Saylor, is a huge supporter of the cryptocurrency and his company has been snapping up billions of dollars worth of the coins. The strategy has so far proved successful. In fact, MicroStrategy is trading at a market cap that’s worth more than the value of its entire Bitcoin portfolio. How does this happen? And how long can it keep going? In this episode, we speak with Bloomberg Opinion’s Matt Levi】
